question: Show the different keywords articles which has shown at Science and Technology Management Research used.
query: SELECT DISTINCT Paper_Keywords.keyword FROM Paper_Keywords JOIN (SELECT paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE venue_id = (SELECT id FROM Venue WHERE DisplayName = 'Science and Technology Management Research')) AS STM_Papers ON Paper_Keywords.paper_id = STM_Papers.paper_id;

question: find researcher who published all his paper after 2016.
query: SELECT Author.name FROM Author WHERE Author.id NOT IN      (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id      FROM Paper_Authors      JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id      WHERE Paper.year <= 2016) GROUP BY Author.name;

question: Where to find the pdf file of the paper 'Femtochemistry.'?
query: SELECT Paper.pdf FROM Paper WHERE Paper.title = 'Femtochemistry.';

question: what orgnization has most researchers once belongs to it?
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name, COUNT(DISTINCT Orgnization_Researchers.author_id) as NumberOfResearchers FROM Orgnization_Researchers GROUP BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name ORDER BY NumberOfResearchers DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Among all institutions, which one has the most researchers having research interests in 'algorithms' for now?
query: SELECT Author_Interested_In_Algorithms.org, COUNT(Author_Interested_In_Algorithms.id) AS researcher_count FROM (SELECT Author.id, Author.org FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.tag = 'algorithms') AS Author_Interested_In_Algorithms GROUP BY Author_Interested_In_Algorithms.org ORDER BY researcher_count DESC LIMIT 1;

question: What is the most commonly used language by S.J. Enna for publishing articles?
query: SELECT Paper.lang FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id JOIN (SELECT Author.id FROM Author WHERE Author.name = 'S.J. Enna') AS Adam ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Adam.id GROUP BY Paper.lang ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

question: list the researcher with highest h-index from each institution.
query: SELECT Author.org, Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index FROM Author GROUP BY Author.org;

question: what percentage of papers have zero citation?
query: SELECT (CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Paper WHERE n_citation = 0) AS FLOAT) / CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Paper) AS FLOAT)) * 100 AS Percentage_Zero_Citation FROM Paper LIMIT 1;

question: In what language was Rudi Studer's most highly cited work written?
query: SELECT Paper.lang FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id WHERE Author.name = 'Rudi Studer' ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Which research interest has the most total weights arcorss researchers?
query: SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag, SUM(Researcher_Interests.weight) AS Tot_Weight FROM Researcher_Interests GROUP BY Researcher_Interests.tag ORDER BY Tot_Weight DESC LIMIT 1;

question: find researchers who have a null research interest.
query: SELECT DISTINCT Author.name FROM Author LEFT JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.tag IS NULL;

question: for each academic title, show the reseacher with most publication.
query: SELECT Author.position, Author.name, MAX(Author.n_pubs) AS Most_Publications FROM Author GROUP BY Author.position;

question: list orgnizations with a substring 'University' in their display name.
query: SELECT Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Affiliation WHERE Affiliation.DisplayName LIKE '%University%'

question: how many paper have only one page?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Paper WHERE Paper.page_start = Paper.page_end;

question: What are the research interests of the most cited authors at Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade?
query: SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag FROM Researcher_Interests WHERE Researcher_Interests.author_id = (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN (SELECT Paper.id, Paper.n_citation FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade') AS Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.id GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id ORDER BY SUM(Venue_Papers.n_citation) DESC LIMIT 1);

question: How many conferences did Yuqiong Liu publish articles in 2012?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.id) FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id WHERE Author.name = 'Yuqiong Liu' AND Paper.year = 2012;

question: What language is 'Stable Algorithms for Link Analysis.' written in?
query: SELECT Paper.lang FROM Paper WHERE Paper.title = 'Stable Algorithms for Link Analysis.';

question: What is the title of the author who has published the most papers in Nature Communications?
query: SELECT Author.name FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS Nature_Communications_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Nature_Communications_Papers.id GROUP BY Author.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

question: What academic position does Lin Xu take?
query: SELECT Author.position FROM Author WHERE Author.name = 'Lin Xu';

question: Given that an institution's citation is the sum of citation of the researchers currently belong to it; Among all institutions, which one has the highest citation count?
query: SELECT Author.org, SUM(Author.n_citation) AS total_citations FROM Author GROUP BY Author.org ORDER BY total_citations DESC LIMIT 1;

question: In which languages has Rudi Studer published articles?
query: SELECT DISTINCT Paper.lang FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id JOIN (SELECT Author.id FROM Author WHERE Author.name = 'Rudi Studer') AS Rudi_Studer ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Rudi_Studer.id;

question: What are the top 5 publishing institutions in British Journal of Cancer?
query: SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) as num_papers FROM Author  JOIN (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id) AS BJC_Authors ON Author.id = BJC_Authors.author_id GROUP BY Author.org ORDER BY num_papers DESC LIMIT 5;

question: which website can I find information about Yale University?
query: SELECT affiliation.url FROM affiliation WHERE affiliation.DisplayName = 'Yale University';

question: What are the research interests of the most cited authors within Peking University?
query: SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag FROM Researcher_Interests WHERE Researcher_Interests.author_id IN (SELECT Author.id FROM Author WHERE Author.org = 'Peking University' ORDER BY Author.n_citation DESC LIMIT 1);

question: What are the authors of 'Cybersecurity.'?
query: SELECT Author.name FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.title = 'Cybersecurity.';

question: Which conference accepted 'A Dozen Tricks with Multitask Learning.'?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.title = 'A Dozen Tricks with Multitask Learning.';

question: list year that have papers come out after 2010 in ascending order.
query: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year ASC;

question: Which keywords are cross-related to bioinformatics?
query: SELECT DISTINCT Paper_Keywords.keyword FROM Paper_Keywords WHERE Paper_Keywords.paper_id IN (SELECT Paper_Keywords.paper_id FROM Paper_Keywords WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'bioinformatics');

question: list scholars that once have a keyword in his paper same as one of his research interest.
query: SELECT DISTINCT Author.name FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = Researcher_Interests.tag;

question: Which researchers at University of Oxford have published over 9 articles?
query: SELECT Author.name FROM Author  WHERE Author.org = 'University of Oxford' AND Author.n_pubs > 9;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both 'International Journal of Intelligent Computing in Medical Sciences' and 'Journal of Molecular Structure: THEOCHEM'.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('International Journal of Intelligent Computing in Medical Sciences', 'Journal of Molecular Structure: THEOCHEM')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('International Journal of Intelligent Computing in Medical Sciences', 'Journal of Molecular Structure: THEOCHEM'))) = 2;

question: Which papers in the database have a title that starts with 'A'?
Which authors have published papers in both "IEEE Transactions on Image Processing" and "ACM Transactions on Graphics"?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Image Processing', 'ACM Transactions on Graphics')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: Among all universities, which one has the highest h-index of its researchers?
query:
SELECT Author.org, MAX(Author.h_index) AS Highest_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Affiliation ON Author.org = Affiliation.DisplayName
WHERE Affiliation.type = 'university'
GROUP BY Author.org
ORDER BY Highest_H_Index DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: What is the total number of papers published by authors affiliated with Stanford University?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'Stanford University';

question: What are the papers published in the year 2019 with more than 100 citations?
What is the total number of publications by researchers at Stanford University?
What is the total number of papers published by researchers affiliated with Stanford University?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'Stanford University';

question: Which author has the highest h-index in the field of "image processing"?
query:
SELECT Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'image processing';

question: Which journals have published articles with titles starting with 'Advances in'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName
FROM Venue
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.title LIKE 'Advances in%';

question: How many papers have been published in the year 2015?
What is the total number of publications for each organization?
What is the total number of papers published in 2020?
List the authors who have published papers in at least two different languages.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.lang) >= 2;

question: Find the author who has the highest h-index among all authors?
query:
SELECT Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index
FROM Author;

question: What is the total number of publications for each researcher?
query:
SELECT Author.name, Author.n_pubs
FROM Author;

question: What are the top 5 countries with the highest number of publications in the field of computer science?
query:
SELECT Affiliation.type, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Affiliation 
JOIN (SELECT Author.org FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'computer science') AS CS_Authors
ON Affiliation.DisplayName = CS_Authors.org
GROUP BY Affiliation.type
ORDER BY num_papers DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Which affiliation has the highest number of publications by authors with the position of associate professor?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) as num_pubs
FROM Author
WHERE Author.position = 'associate professor'
GROUP BY Author.org
ORDER BY num_pubs DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: List the authors who have published papers in multiple languages.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.lang) > 1;

question: Which authors have a higher h-index than their total number of publications?
Which authors have published papers in both IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence and ACM Transactions on Computer-Human Interaction?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'ACM Transactions on Computer-Human Interaction')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'ACM Transactions on Computer-Human Interaction'))) = 2;

question: List the authors who have published papers with the keyword 'machine learning'.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'machine learning';

question: How many papers did each author with a name starting with 'A' publish?
List the authors who have published papers in both 2016 and 2017.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
     WHERE Paper.year = 2016)
AND Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
     WHERE Paper.year = 2017)
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: What are the top 5 most published papers in the conference 'ICML'?
query:
SELECT Paper.title, COUNT(*) as num_times_published
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ICML'
GROUP BY Paper.title
ORDER BY num_times_published DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Which institution has the highest number of papers published in the year 2020?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Author 
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.year = 2020
GROUP BY Author.org
ORDER BY num_papers DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which researchers have published papers in both British Journal of Cancer and Nature Communications?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS NC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = NC_Papers.id;

question: How many authors have a higher h-index than their number of publications?
What is the publication year of the paper with the highest number of citations?
query:
SELECT Paper.year
FROM Paper
ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: What are the titles of the papers published by authors with an h-index greater than 10?

SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.h_index > 10;

question: What is the URL of affiliation 'Harvard University'?
What is the total number of papers published by the author with the highest h-index?

SELECT Author.n_pubs
FROM Author
ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: How many papers have been published in the journal "IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence"?

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper

JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id

question: Which authors have published papers in both ASCM and IEICE Transactions?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id

WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('ASCM', 'IEICE Transactions')

question: How many papers are there in the database that have been published in 2015?
How many papers does each author with the position of associate professor have?
List the authors who have published papers in at least three different conferences.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.venue_id) >= 3;

question: Which author has the highest h-index at 'South African Computer Journal'?
query:
SELECT Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal') AS SACJ_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = SACJ_Papers.id;

question: List the papers published by the author with the highest h-index.
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN (SELECT Author.id FROM Author ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC LIMIT 1) AS Top_Author
ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Top_Author.id;

question: List all the papers published by author 'John Smith'.
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.name = 'John Smith';

question: How many papers have been published by researchers affiliated with the University of Cambridge in the year 2020?

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of Cambridge' AND Paper.year = 2020;

question: List the top 5 most prolific authors in terms of number of papers published.
query:

FROM Author

LIMIT 5;

question: What are the authors and their affiliations for the paper 'Machine Learning Techniques for Online Social Media Analysis.'?

FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id

question: Which authors have published papers at both the South African Computer Journal and the ASCM conference?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'ASCM conference')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) > 1;

question: What is the average number of publications per researcher?
query:
SELECT AVG(Author.n_pubs) AS Avg_Publications
FROM Author;

question: Which authors have published papers in both 'Nature' and 'Science' journals?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature'
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science';

question: Which authors have published papers in conferences and journals with the same name?

FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
GROUP BY Author.name, Venue.DisplayName
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) > 1;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both 'Cybersecurity.' and 'Artificial Intelligence.'

FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.title IN ('Cybersecurity.', 'Artificial Intelligence.')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.title) = 2;

question: What is the average number of citations per paper in the year 2015?

JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id

question: List the authors who published papers with the keyword "machine learning" in 2020.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id

question: What is the average number of citations per paper for authors who have published at least 10 papers?
List the authors who have published papers in all years from 2000 to 2020.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT *
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020) AS Years
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT *
        FROM Paper
        JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.year = Years.year
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: What is the total number of papers published in IEEE Transactions on Image Processing?

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Image Processing';

question: Show the affiliations of the authors who have published articles at the conference 'ACL: Association for Computational Linguistics' and the conference 'NAACL: North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics'.

FROM Author

question: Which papers were published in the conference 'ACM SIGCOMM Computer Communication Review'?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ACM SIGCOMM Computer Communication Review';

question: Which papers have been co-authored by Xiangyu Sheng and Hans-Joachim Knoelker?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA1 ON Paper.id = PA1.paper_id
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA2 ON Paper.id = PA2.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A1 ON PA1.author_id = A1.id
JOIN Author AS A2 ON PA2.author_id = A2.id
WHERE A1.name = 'Xiangyu Sheng' AND A2.name = 'Hans-Joachim Knoelker';

question: What is the total number of papers published by researchers at Stanford University
Which authors have published papers in both ACL and NAACL conferences?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('ACL', 'NAACL')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: List the title, publication year, and number of citations for papers published by authors affiliated with "University of California, Berkeley" in the year 2018.
query:
SELECT Paper.title, Paper.year, Paper.n_citation
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of California, Berkeley' AND Paper.year = 2018;

question: Which authors have published papers in at least two different languages?

FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id

GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.lang) >= 2;

FROM Paper

question: List the authors who have published papers in both IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence and IEEE Transactions on Image Processing.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence') AS PAMI_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = PAMI_Papers.id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Image Processing') AS TIP_Papers

question: Which authors have published papers in both Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences and Nature?

ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = PNAS_Papers.id

);

SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Neural Networks', 'Artificial Intelligence')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: What are the titles of the papers published by authors affiliated with "Harvard University"?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'Harvard University';

question: How many papers were published in 2018?
What are the affiliations of the authors who have published papers in 'Artificial Intelligence'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Affiliation.DisplayName
FROM Affiliation
JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Affiliation.DisplayName = Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Orgnization_Researchers.author_id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Artificial Intelligence';

question: Among all institutions, how many researchers have a h-index greater than 10?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) AS num_researchers
FROM Author
WHERE Author.h_index > 10
GROUP BY Author.org;

question: How many papers did each author publish?
query:
SELECT Author.name, COUNT(Paper_Authors.paper_id) as num_papers
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: What is the average h-index of authors who have published in at least three different conferences?
query:
SELECT AVG(Author.h_index)
FROM Author
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
     GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id
     HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.venue_id) >= 3);

question: What is the author's current organization of the paper with the title 'Advocacy Coalition Framework' written by Sabrina Juarez?
query:
SELECT Author.org
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.title = 'Advocacy Coalition Framework' AND Author.name = 'Sabrina Juarez';

question: What is the total number of papers published by authors from each institution?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) AS Total_Papers
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
GROUP BY Author.org;

question: Find the average number of publication per author.
query:
SELECT AVG(Author.n_pubs) AS Avg_Publications
FROM Author;

question: What is the total number of papers published by researchers at University of Cambridge?
List the papers that have been published in both Nature and Science.
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers AS VP1 ON Paper.id = VP1.paper_id
JOIN Venue AS V1 ON VP1.venue_id = V1.id
JOIN Venue_Papers AS VP2 ON Paper.id = VP2.paper_id
JOIN Venue AS V2 ON VP2.venue_id = V2.id
WHERE V1.DisplayName = 'Nature' AND V2.DisplayName = 'Science';

question: How many papers have been published in each year from 2010 to 2020?
query:
SELECT Paper.year, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Paper
WHERE Paper.year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020
GROUP BY Paper.year;

question: List the top 5 authors with the highest h-indices.
query:
SELECT Author.name, Author.h_index
FROM Author
ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Which authors have published papers in both the conferences 'AAAI' and 'IJCAI'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'AAAI'
AND Author.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT Author.id
                   FROM Author
                   JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
                   JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
                   JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
                   WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IJCAI');

question: Which authors have collaborated with Xiangyu Sheng?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author

WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Paper_Authors.paper_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id WHERE Author.name = 'Xiangyu Sheng')
AND Author.name != 'Xiangyu Sheng';

question: Which authors have published papers in all conferences?
What are the affiliations of the authors who have published papers in both Nature and IEEE Transactions on Image Processing?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Affiliation.DisplayName
FROM Affiliation
JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Affiliation.DisplayName = Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name
WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.author_id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
     JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
     WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Nature', 'IEEE Transactions on Image Processing')
     GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id
     HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2);

question: What is the h-index of the author with the highest number of publications in 2018?
query:
SELECT Author.h_index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper WHERE Paper.year = 2018) AS Papers_2018
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Papers_2018.id
GROUP BY Author.id
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: How many papers were published in the year 2018?
Which research interests have the highest average weight across all researchers?

GROUP BY Researcher_Interests.tag

question: Which papers have a number of citations greater than 1000 and were published in 2020?
How many papers are published in the year 2018?
What are the affiliations of the authors who have published papers in both Nature and Science?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Affiliation.DisplayName
FROM Affiliation
JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Affiliation.DisplayName = Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name
WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.author_id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
     JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
     WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Nature', 'Science')
     GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id
     HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2);

question: How many authors have published articles in both Nature and Science?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id) 
FROM (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
      WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature'
      INTERSECT
      SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
      WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science');

List the authors who have published papers in at least two different conferences in 2019.
query:
SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
WHERE Paper.year = 2019
GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.venue_id) >= 2;

question: Which researchers have published papers in both conferences Neural Networks and Nature Communications?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Neural Networks', 'Nature Communications')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: How many papers does each organization has published in total?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Author 
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
GROUP BY Author.org;

question: Which papers have a title that starts with 'Learning'?
List all authors who have published more than 100 papers.
How many papers were published in the year 2000?
Which authors have the highest h-index in their respective organizations?
Which authors have the highest number of publications in Nature Communications?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS Nature_Communications_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Nature_Communications_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: List all papers published by authors from the University of Cambridge.
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of Cambridge';

question: Which papers have the highest number of citations in the database?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: list the authors who have published the most papers in the venue 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence'.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors
ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence') AS IEEE_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = IEEE_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both British Journal of Cancer and Nature Communications.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS NC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = NC_Papers.id;

question: Which authors have published papers in both Bioinformatics and Nature Communications?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Bioinformatics', 'Nature Communications')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: Which papers have been published in the conference with the highest number of citations?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN (SELECT Venue.id, SUM(Paper.n_citation) AS total_citations FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Venue.id ORDER BY total_citations DESC LIMIT 1) AS Most_Cited_Venue
ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Most_Cited_Venue.id;

question: Which authors have published papers with Yuqiong Liu?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Paper_Authors.paper_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id WHERE Author.name = 'Yuqiong Liu')
AND Author.name != 'Yuqiong Liu';

question: Which authors have published articles in both Nature and Science?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Nature', 'Science')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: What are the titles of the most recent papers published by the top 3 authors with the highest h-index?
query:
SELECT Author.name, Paper.title
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Author.id IN (SELECT id FROM Author ORDER BY h_index DESC LIMIT 3)
ORDER BY Paper.year DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: What is the total number of publications in each language in the dataset?

question: What is the total number of papers published by authors who have a position of associate professor?

FROM Author

JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal') AS SACJ_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = SACJ_Papers.id

question: Which researchers have published papers in both Nature Communications and Science?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS Nature_Communications_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Nature_Communications_Papers.id
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Author.id
    FROM Author
    JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
    JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science') AS Science_Papers

question: Which authors have published papers in both British Journal of Cancer and Nature Communications?

question: Which papers have been co-authored by the same authors?

question: Which researchers have published papers with the keyword 'machine learning' but have never published papers with the keyword 'deep learning'?

FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'machine learning' AND Author.id NOT IN 
    (SELECT DISTINCT Author.id
     FROM Author
     JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
     JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
     WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'deep learning');

question: What are the affiliations of the authors of the paper with the title 'Parallel Computing: Past, Present, and Future'?

FROM Affiliation

JOIN Paper_Authors ON Orgnization_Researchers.author_id = Paper_Authors.author_id

WHERE Paper.title = 'Parallel Computing: Past, Present, and Future';

question: Which conferences have the highest number of papers published after 2015?
query:
SELECT Venue.DisplayName, COUNT(*) AS num_papers
FROM Venue
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.year > 2015

LIMIT 1;

question: Which authors have published papers in all years between 2010 and 2019?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2019) AS Years
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT * 
        FROM Paper
        JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.year = Years.year
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both Nature Communications and Science.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS Nature_Communications_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Nature_Communications_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science') AS Science_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Science_Papers.id;

question: List the authors who have published papers in all three venues: Conference A, Conference B, Conference C.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
     JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
     WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Conference A')
AND Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
     JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
     WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Conference B')
AND Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
     JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
     WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Conference C');

question: Which authors have published papers with the most number of citations?

question: Which authors have published papers at both the South African Computer Journal and the IEICE Transactions?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'IEICE Transactions')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'IEICE Transactions') AND Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) > 1;

question: Which authors have published articles in both Neural Networks and Nature Communications?

question: Find the authors who have the highest total number of publications.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
ORDER BY Author.n_pubs DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: How many papers in the database are written in Chinese?
For each author, how many papers have they published?
query:
SELECT Author.name, COUNT(Paper_Authors.paper_id) as num_papers
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: Which authors have published papers in all conferences in the database?
For researchers who have published at least one paper after 2010, what is the average number of citations their papers have received per year?
query:
SELECT AVG(Paper.n_citation) / (2022 - MIN(Paper.year)) AS avg_citations_per_year
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
WHERE Paper.year > 2010;

question: What are the titles of the papers authored by Hans-Joachim Knoelker?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.name = 'Hans-Joachim Knoelker';

question: Which papers have been co-authored by Hans-Joachim Knoelker and V. Gusmeroli?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA1 ON Paper.id = PA1.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A1 ON PA1.author_id = A1.id
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA2 ON Paper.id = PA2.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A2 ON PA2.author_id = A2.id
WHERE A1.name = 'Hans-Joachim Knoelker' AND A2.name = 'V. Gusmeroli';

question: Which researchers have published papers in both IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence and Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue_Papers.venue_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) > 1;

question: Which papers have been published in both South African Computer Journal and ASCM?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'ASCM')
GROUP BY Paper.title
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: How many papers were published in the South African Computer Journal in 2019?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal' AND Paper.year = 2019;

question: Which authors have published papers in both 'Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research' and 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research', 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research', 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade'))) = 2;

question: What is the total number of papers published by each author in "IEEE Transactions"?
query:
SELECT Author.name, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Author 
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions') AS IEEE_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = IEEE_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: What is the total number of publications for each researcher in the database?
query:
SELECT Author.name, Author.n_pubs
FROM Author;

question: Find the authors who have published papers in both NeuroImage and Journal of Neurology, Neurosurgery & Psychiatry.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('NeuroImage', 'Journal of Neurology, Neurosurgery & Psychiatry')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: What are the titles of the articles published by researchers from University of Oxford in 2019?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of Oxford' AND Paper.year = 2019;

question: What is the average number of pages in papers published in 2018?

JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id

question: How many authors have a h-index higher than 10?
What is the total number of citations for each paper published in 2015?

question: list the authors who have published papers in more than one language.

JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id

question: What are the papers published by author 'Hans-Joachim Knoelker'?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id

question: Which authors have published papers in both British Journal of Cancer and European Journal of Cancer?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'European Journal of Cancer') AS EJC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = EJC_Papers.id;

question: How many authors have published articles in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Paper_Authors.author_id)
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence') AS TPAMI_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = TPAMI_Papers.id;

question: What is the h-index of the author who published 'A Review on Ensemble Methods for Imbalanced Classification' in 2018?
query:
SELECT Author.h_index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.title = 'A Review on Ensemble Methods for Imbalanced Classification' AND Paper.year = 2018;

question: Which institutions have researchers who have published articles in both Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade and British Journal of Cancer?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.org
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade', 'British Journal of Cancer')) AS Venue_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.org
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.id) = 2;

question: What are the authors and their affiliations for the paper with the title 'Learning via Finitely Many Queries.'?
query:
SELECT Author.name, Author.org
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id

question: Which papers have been published in both Nature Communications and Science?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers AS VP1 ON Paper.id = VP1.paper_id
JOIN Venue AS V1 ON VP1.venue_id = V1.id
JOIN Venue_Papers AS VP2 ON Paper.id = VP2.paper_id
JOIN Venue AS V2 ON VP2.venue_id = V2.id
WHERE V1.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications' AND V2.DisplayName = 'Science';

question: Which authors have published in both the South African Computer Journal and IEICE Transactions?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'IEICE Transactions')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'IEICE Transactions') AND Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) = 2;

question: Which papers have been co-authored by both Xiangyu Sheng and Hans-Joachim Knoelker?

JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA2 ON Paper.id = PA2.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A2 ON PA2.author_id = A2.id
WHERE A1.name = 'Xiangyu Sheng' AND A2.name = 'Hans-Joachim Knoelker';

question: Which institutions have researchers with an h-index higher than 10?

question: Which authors have published papers in both British Journal of Cancer and Lancet Oncology?

JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers

question: What are the affiliations of the authors who have published papers in the conference 'ACM Transactions on Graphics'?

question: What are the top 5 most cited papers at the conference Neural Information Processing Systems?

JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Neural Information Processing Systems'
ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Which papers have authors from both 'University of Oxford' and 'University of Cambridge'?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
WHERE Paper.id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.paper_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
     WHERE Author.org = 'University of Oxford')

question: How many authors have published papers in multiple conferences/journals?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id) 
FROM (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id, COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.venue_id) as venue_count
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id
      HAVING venue_count > 1);

question: What is the most common affiliation type in the database?

question: What are the research interests of the authors who have published articles in both "International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV)" and "European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV)"?

FROM Researcher_Interests

FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'ASCM conferences')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'ASCM conferences') AND Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) = 2;

question: List all the authors who have published articles in at least two different languages.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.lang) >= 2;

question: Which authors have the highest h-index at conferences with more than 500 papers?
query:
SELECT Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Venue_Papers.venue_id FROM Venue_Papers GROUP BY Venue_Papers.venue_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 500) AS Large_Conferences ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Large_Conferences.venue_id
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY Highest_H_Index DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which authors have published papers in at least 3 different conferences?

HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.venue_id) >= 3;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both ACL and EMNLP conferences.

question: How many papers are published in the South African Computer Journal in each year?

question: Which authors have published articles in both Nature Communications and Science?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS Nature_Communications_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Nature_Communications_Papers.id
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Author.id
    FROM Author
    JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
    JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science') AS Science_Papers
    ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Science_Papers.id);

question: Which researchers have an h-index greater than 10 and have published papers in both 2018 and 2019?

GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.year) > 1;

question: What are the top 5 publishing institutions in terms of the number of papers published in British Journal of Cancer after 2015?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Author 
JOIN (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer' AND Paper.year > 2015) AS BJC_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id) AS BJC_Authors

GROUP BY Author.org
ORDER BY num_papers DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: What is the citation count of the paper with the title 'Deep Learning in Natural Language Processing.'?
What are the research interests of the authors who have published papers in both Nature Communications and Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade?
query:
SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag
FROM Researcher_Interests
WHERE Researcher_Interests.author_id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     JOIN (SELECT Paper.id
           FROM Paper
           JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
           JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
           WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Nature Communications', 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade')
           GROUP BY Paper.id
           HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2) AS Both_Venues_Papers
     ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Both_Venues_Papers.id);

JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal' AND Paper.year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;

question: Find the average number of publications per researcher.
query:
SELECT AVG(Author.n_pubs) AS Avg_Publications
FROM Author;

question: List all the papers published by authors who are currently affiliated with "University of California, Berkeley".
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of California, Berkeley';

question: Which authors have published papers in both Science and Nature
query:
SELECT DISTINCT a1.name
FROM Author a1
JOIN Paper_Authors pa1 ON a1.id = pa1.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers vp1 ON pa1.paper_id = vp1.paper_id
JOIN Venue v1 ON vp1.venue_id = v1.id
WHERE v1.DisplayName = 'Science'
AND a1.id IN (
    SELECT a2.id
    FROM Author a2
    JOIN Paper_Authors pa2 ON a2.id = pa2.author_id
    JOIN Venue_Papers vp2 ON pa2.paper_id = vp2.paper_id
    JOIN Venue v2 ON vp2.venue_id = v2.id
    WHERE v2.DisplayName = 'Nature'
)

question: How many papers does each researcher from University of California, Berkeley have?
What are the affiliations of authors who have published papers in both IEEE Transactions on Robotics and Automation and Robotics and Autonomous Systems?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Affiliation.DisplayName
FROM Affiliation
JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Affiliation.DisplayName = Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name
WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.author_id IN 
    (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
     FROM Paper_Authors
     WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN 
        (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id
         FROM Venue_Papers
         WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN 
            (SELECT Venue.id
             FROM Venue
             WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Robotics and Automation', 'Robotics and Autonomous Systems'))))

question: Which papers have been published in conferences/journals with more than 5000 citations in total?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Venue.id HAVING SUM(Paper.n_citation) > 5000) AS High_Citation_Venues
ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = High_Citation_Venues.id;

question: List all the papers published in 2015 that have a keyword related to machine learning.
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper.year = 2015 AND Paper_Keywords.keyword LIKE '%machine learning%';

question: How many papers were published by each author in the year 2020?
query:
SELECT Author.name, COUNT(Paper.id) as num_papers
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.year = 2020
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: Which papers have a title that includes the word 'neural network'?

JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id

question: List the authors who have published papers in both Nature Communications and Science Advances.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS Nature_Communications_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Nature_Communications_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science Advances') AS Science_Advances_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Science_Advances_Papers.id;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence' and 'ACM Transactions on Computer Systems'.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'ACM Transactions on Computer Systems')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'ACM Transactions on Computer Systems'))) = 2;

question: List the authors who have published the most papers in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors
ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence') AS TPAMI_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = TPAMI_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which authors have published articles in both conferences ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining and International Conference on Machine Learning?

GROUP BY Author.name

question: How many authors have published papers in both the South African Computer Journal and ASCM conferences?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id) 
FROM (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
      WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal'
      INTERSECT
      SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
      WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ASCM conferences');

question: Which keywords are commonly used in papers published in the South African Computer Journal?

question: Which authors have a higher h-index than their number of paper publications?

question: Which authors have published at least 10 papers?

FROM Paper

question: What is the total number of publications by researchers affiliated with Stanford University?

question: List the authors who have published papers in all years from 2010 to 2019.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2019) AS Years
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT * 
        FROM Paper
        JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.year = Years.year
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: Which conference has the highest total number of citations for all its papers?

question: What are the top 3 most common research interests among authors in the field of artificial intelligence?
query:
SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM Researcher_Interests
JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT Paper_Authors.author_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'artificial intelligence') AS AI_Authors
ON Researcher_Interests.author_id = AI_Authors.author_id
GROUP BY Researcher_Interests.tag
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 3;

query:

FROM Author

GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: List the authors who have published the most papers in 2019.

SELECT Author.name

JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id

GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: What is the total number of authors in the dataset?
query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Author;

question: What is the total number of papers published by authors who have an academic position of "associate_prof"?
Which authors have published papers in all years from 2010 to 2020?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020) AS Years
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT * 
        FROM Paper
        JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.year = Years.year
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: For each author, what is the average number of citations per paper they have?
query:
SELECT Author.name, (CAST(SUM(Paper.n_citation) AS FLOAT) / CAST(COUNT(Paper.id) AS FLOAT)) AS avg_citations_per_paper
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: Which universities have published articles in the Journal of Machine Learning Research?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.org
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Journal of Machine Learning Research') AS JMLR_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = JMLR_Papers.id
WHERE Author.org IS NOT NULL;

question: List the authors who have published papers in both Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade and Nature Communications.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade') AS NNTT_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = NNTT_Papers.id
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Author.id
    FROM Author
    JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
    JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS NC_Papers
    ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = NC_Papers.id);

question: Among the authors who have published at least 5 papers, who has the highest average number of citations per paper?
query:
SELECT Author.name, (CAST(SUM(Paper.n_citation) AS FLOAT) / CAST(COUNT(Paper.id) AS FLOAT)) AS avg_citations
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(Paper.id) >= 5
ORDER BY avg_citations DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which authors have published papers in both Nature Communications and Cell?

question: For each researcher, show the percentage of their papers that have been cited at least once.

SELECT Author.name, (CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.n_citation > 0) AS FLOAT) / CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id) AS FLOAT)) * 100 AS Percentage_Cited
FROM Author;

question: Which authors have published papers in both IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence and IEEE Transactions on Image Processing?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence') AS PAMI_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = PAMI_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Image Processing') AS TIP_Papers

question: List all the authors who have published papers in all years from 2015 to 2020.

)
GROUP BY Author.name;

JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature'
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id

question: List all the authors who have published papers in both British Journal of Cancer and Science and Technology Management Research.

AND Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science and Technology Management Research');

question: Which papers have been co-authored by both Hans-Joachim Knoelker and V. Gusmeroli?

question: Which authors have a h-index greater than 10 and have published papers in multiple venues?

question: How many papers have been published in the journal "IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence" in 2018?

question: How many papers were published in the year 2019?
How many authors have published papers in both the conference 'ICML' and the journal 'Neural Networks'?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id)
FROM (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
      WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ICML'
      INTERSECT
      SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
      WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Neural Networks') AS Authors;

question: What is the total number of publications by researchers affiliated with University of Cambridge?
What are the most common research interests among authors at the top 5 publishing institutions in British Journal of Cancer?
query:
SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM Researcher_Interests
WHERE Researcher_Interests.author_id IN 
    (SELECT Author.id 
    FROM Author 
    JOIN (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id 
          FROM Paper_Authors 
          JOIN (SELECT Paper.id 
                FROM Paper 
                JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id 
                JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id 
                WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers 
          ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id) AS BJC_Authors
    ON Author.id = BJC_Authors.author_id
    GROUP BY Author.org
    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    LIMIT 5)
GROUP BY Researcher_Interests.tag
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: How many papers are published in the year 2017?

question: Which authors have published papers in both IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering and ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering') AS IEEE_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = IEEE_Papers.id
WHERE Author.id IN 
    (SELECT Author.id
    FROM Author
    JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
    JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology') AS ACM_Papers

question: What is the h-index of the author who has published the most papers in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence?

ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = TPAMI_Papers.id

question: Which authors have published papers in both Nature Communications and Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade?

question: Which author has the highest h-index at Cambridge University?

question: What are the affiliations of the authors with the highest h-index in each year?

question: List the authors who have published papers in both "IEEE Transactions on Image Processing" and "ACM Transactions on Graphics".

question: Which authors have published papers in both the British Journal of Cancer and Nature Communications?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name

JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author

question: Which authors have collaborated with each other the most number of times?
query:
SELECT Paper_Authors1.author_id AS author1, Paper_Authors2.author_id AS author2, COUNT(*) AS collaboration_count
FROM Paper_Authors AS Paper_Authors1
JOIN Paper_Authors AS Paper_Authors2 ON Paper_Authors1.paper_id = Paper_Authors2.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Authors1.author_id < Paper_Authors2.author_id
GROUP BY Paper_Authors1.author_id, Paper_Authors2.author_id
ORDER BY collaboration_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
