question: What is the total number of papers published by authors from University of California, Berkeley?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of California, Berkeley';

question: List the authors who have published papers in both Neurocomputing and Pattern Recognition.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Neurocomputing', 'Pattern Recognition')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: What is the publication year of the paper titled 'Machine Learning in Bioinformatics.'?
What are the top 3 most cited papers at the conference 'International Conference on Image Processing'?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'International Conference on Image Processing'
ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: What is the position of the author who has the highest h-index in the database?
query:
SELECT Author.position
FROM Author
ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which authors have published papers in both English and Chinese languages?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE Author.id IN (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.lang = 'English') 
AND Author.id IN (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id FROM Paper_Authors JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.lang = 'Chinese');

question: What are the top 5 most cited papers in the field of machine learning?
query:
SELECT Paper.title, Paper.n_citation
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'machine learning'
ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: List the authors who have published at least 10 papers.
Which authors have published papers in both Bioinformatics and Neural Networks?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Bioinformatics', 'Neural Networks')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: What is the total number of papers published by authors who have affiliated with the University of Cambridge?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Paper_Authors.paper_id)
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id
WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = 'University of Cambridge';

question: What is the total number of citations for each researcher in the database?
What are the names of the authors who have published papers in both 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence' and 'ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence', 'ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology'))) = 2;

question: List the papers with more than 100 citations.
What is the total number of citations received by papers published in the Asian Conference on Computer Vision in 2015?
query:
SELECT SUM(Paper.n_citation)
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Asian Conference on Computer Vision' AND Paper.year = 2015;

question: Which authors have published papers at both ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security and IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security', 'IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue_Papers.venue_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) > 1;

question: List all authors who have published papers in conferences and journals.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id;

question: What is the average h-index of authors who have published more than 50 papers?
What is the publication title of the paper with the highest number of citations?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: What are the affiliations of the authors who have the highest h-index?
What are the titles of the papers published in the South African Computer Journal?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal';

question: List the authors who have published at least one paper in both Proceedings of the IEEE and ACM Transactions on Database Systems.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Proceedings of the IEEE', 'ACM Transactions on Database Systems')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: What is the total number of papers published by researchers affiliated with each institution?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) AS Total_Papers
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
GROUP BY Author.org;

question: Find the author(s) who have the highest number of publications in the year 2015.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.year = 2015
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: What are the affiliations of the authors who published papers in the conference 'IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control' in 2019?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Affiliation.DisplayName
FROM Affiliation
JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Affiliation.DisplayName = Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Orgnization_Researchers.author_id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control' AND Paper.year = 2019;

question: What is the average number of publications per researcher at University of Cambridge?
What is the total number of papers authored by researchers from the University of Cambridge?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of Cambridge';

question: Which papers have "machine learning" as one of their keywords?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'machine learning';

question: What is the total number of publications by the author 'Hans-Joachim Knoelker'?
What is the average h-index of researchers who have published articles in the conference "International Conference on Machine Learning"?
query:
SELECT AVG(Author.h_index) AS Avg_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'International Conference on Machine Learning') AS ICML_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = ICML_Papers.id;

question: What are the authors of the paper with the title 'Cybersecurity.'?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.title = 'Cybersecurity.';

question: What is the total number of researchers who have published papers in this database?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id) 
FROM Paper_Authors;

question: How many researchers have a position of associate professor?
What is the total number of citations for each institution in the database?
Which authors have published papers in conferences/journals with the word "Computer" in their display name?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id

WHERE Venue.DisplayName LIKE '%Computer%';

question: List the authors who have published papers in both the South African Computer Journal and the International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution.
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
WHERE Paper_Authors.paper_id IN (SELECT Venue_Papers.paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.venue_id IN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution')))
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution'))) = 2;

question: What is the average h-index of researchers in each institution?
Which papers have a page range starting from page 10 and ending at page 20?
Which papers have Xiangyu Sheng co-authored with Yuqiong Liu?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA1 ON Paper.id = PA1.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A1 ON PA1.author_id = A1.id
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA2 ON Paper.id = PA2.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A2 ON PA2.author_id = A2.id
WHERE A1.name = 'Xiangyu Sheng' AND A2.name = 'Yuqiong Liu';

question: Which authors have published papers in both Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Machine Learning', 'Pattern Recognition')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: Which authors have published articles in both 'Artificial Intelligence' and 'Neural Networks'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Artificial Intelligence'
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Neural Networks';

question: List the authors who have published papers with the keyword 'artificial intelligence' in the British Journal of Cancer.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers
ON Paper_Keywords.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'artificial intelligence';

question: How many authors have published papers in multiple conferences?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id) 
FROM (SELECT Paper_Authors.author_id
      FROM Paper_Authors
      JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
      GROUP BY Paper_Authors.author_id
      HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue_Papers.venue_id) > 1);

question: How many papers has Michael Jordan published in total?
Which venues have published papers on the topic of "machine learning" in the year 2019?
query:
SELECT Venue.DisplayName
FROM Venue
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'machine learning' AND Paper.year = 2019;

question: What are the titles of the papers that have been published by authors from the University of Oxford?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
WHERE Author.org = 'University of Oxford';

question: List the authors in alphabetical order for the paper 'Cybersecurity.'?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.title = 'Cybersecurity.'
ORDER BY Author.name ASC;

question: Which authors have published articles in both Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade and International Conference on Machine Learning?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade', 'International Conference on Machine Learning')
GROUP BY Author.name

question: How many papers in the database have a citation count above 5000?

query:
SELECT Paper.year, COUNT(*) as num_papers
FROM Paper
WHERE Paper.year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020
GROUP BY Paper.year;

question: How many papers in the database have a doi?
How many papers were authored by the researchers from the University of Cambridge?

FROM Paper_Authors
JOIN Author ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id

question: Which authors have published papers in both "IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence" and "ACM Transactions on Graphics"?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence'
AND Author.id IN (SELECT Author.id
                   FROM Author
                   JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
                   JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
                   JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
                   WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ACM Transactions on Graphics');

question: How many papers were published in the conference 'International Workshop on Constraint Solving and Constraint Logic Programming'?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'International Workshop on Constraint Solving and Constraint Logic Programming';

question: Which researchers have published papers in both Nature and Science?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature'
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Science';

question: Which keywords are associated with papers published in the South African Computer Journal?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Paper_Keywords.keyword
FROM Paper_Keywords
JOIN (SELECT paper_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE venue_id = (SELECT id FROM Venue WHERE DisplayName = 'South African Computer Journal')) AS SACJ_Papers
ON Paper_Keywords.paper_id = SACJ_Papers.paper_id;

question: Which affiliation has the most researchers with a position of 'professor'?
query:
SELECT Author.org, COUNT(*) as num_professors
FROM Author
WHERE Author.position = 'professor'
GROUP BY Author.org
ORDER BY num_professors DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which institutions have researchers with an h-index of at least 10?
Which authors have published papers in Proceedings of the 15th ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Proceedings of the 15th ACM SIGKDD International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining') AS KDD_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = KDD_Papers.id;

question: Which authors have published at least one paper in all years between 2010 and 2020?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020) AS Years
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT * 
        FROM Paper
        JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.year = Years.year
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

question: Which researcher has the highest number of publications in the field of 'image processing'?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id
WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'image processing'
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Which authors have published papers in both the South African Computer Journal and ASCM conferences?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id
WHERE Venue.DisplayName IN ('South African Computer Journal', 'ASCM conferences')
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) = 2;

question: Find the author with the highest h-index in conference 'ICML'.
query:
SELECT Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'ICML') AS ICML_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = ICML_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY Highest_H_Index DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: How many papers in the database have a citation count greater than 1000?
Which organizations have researchers who are interested in both algorithms and game theory?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.org
FROM Author
JOIN Researcher_Interests AS RI1 ON Author.id = RI1.author_id
JOIN Researcher_Interests AS RI2 ON Author.id = RI2.author_id
WHERE RI1.tag = 'algorithms' AND RI2.tag = 'game theory';

question: show the titles of papers that were co-authored by a researcher from University of California and a researcher from Stanford University.
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA1 ON Paper.id = PA1.paper_id
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA2 ON Paper.id = PA2.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A1 ON PA1.author_id = A1.id
JOIN Author AS A2 ON PA2.author_id = A2.id
WHERE A1.org = 'University of California' AND A2.org = 'Stanford University';

question: Which papers were published in the conference 'ICSE'?

JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id

question: Which papers have been published at both ICML and NeurIPS?

SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers AS VP1 ON Paper.id = VP1.paper_id
JOIN Venue AS V1 ON VP1.venue_id = V1.id
JOIN Venue_Papers AS VP2 ON Paper.id = VP2.paper_id
JOIN Venue AS V2 ON VP2.venue_id = V2.id
WHERE V1.DisplayName = 'ICML' AND V2.DisplayName = 'NeurIPS';

question: List the authors who have published papers in all the conferences they have attended.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT Venue.id
    FROM Venue
    JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT Paper_Authors.paper_id
        FROM Paper_Authors
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper_Authors.paper_id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Paper

question: How many papers have been published by researchers with a position of 'associate_prof'?

question: Which authors have published papers in both 'British Journal of Cancer' and 'Nature Communications'?
query:
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'British Journal of Cancer') AS BJC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = BJC_Papers.id
INTERSECT
SELECT DISTINCT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Nature Communications') AS NC_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = NC_Papers.id;

question: Which author has the highest number of publications in IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence?
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors
ON Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id
JOIN (SELECT Paper.id FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence') AS IEEE_Papers
ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = IEEE_Papers.id
GROUP BY Author.name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: List the papers published in 2020 with more than 50 citations.

JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id

question: List the authors who have published papers in both the South African Computer Journal and the ASCM.

SELECT DISTINCT Author.name

GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id WHERE Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) > 1;

question: Which author has the highest h-index among the authors who have published at least 3 papers in 2010?
query:
SELECT Author.name, MAX(Author.h_index) as Highest_H_Index
FROM Author
JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id
JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id
WHERE Paper.year = 2010
GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(Paper.id) >= 3
ORDER BY Highest_H_Index DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: For each author, what is the ratio of their number of publications to the number of citations they have received?
List the authors who have published papers in all years between 2015 and 2020.
query:
SELECT Author.name
FROM Author
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * 
    FROM (SELECT DISTINCT year FROM Paper WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020) AS Years
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT * 
        FROM Paper
        JOIN Paper_Authors ON Paper.id = Paper_Authors.paper_id
        WHERE Paper_Authors.author_id = Author.id AND Paper.year = Years.year
    )
)
GROUP BY Author.name;

FROM Paper
JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id
JOIN (SELECT Venue.id FROM Venue JOIN Venue_Papers ON Venue.id = Venue_Papers.venue_id JOIN Paper ON Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Venue.id HAVING SUM(Paper.n_citation) > 1000) AS High_Citation_Venues
ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = High_Citation_Venues.id;

question: Which papers have been co-authored by both John Smith and Mary Johnson?
query:
SELECT Paper.title
FROM Paper
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA1 ON Paper.id = PA1.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A1 ON PA1.author_id = A1.id
JOIN Paper_Authors AS PA2 ON Paper.id = PA2.paper_id
JOIN Author AS A2 ON PA2.author_id = A2.id
WHERE A1.name = 'John Smith' AND A2.name = 'Mary Johnson';

question: What is the average h-index of authors in each institution?

question: List all the authors who have published papers in both the South African Computer Journal and the ASCM conference.

GROUP BY Author.name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT (SELECT Venue_Papers.venue_id FROM Venue_Papers WHERE Venue_Papers.paper_id = Paper_Authors.paper_id)) = 2;

question: What is the h-index of the author who has the most papers published in the conference 'International Conference on Machine Learning'?

question: Which authors have published articles in both IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence and ACM Transactions on Graphics?

SELECT DISTINCT Author.name

question: How many papers have a number of citations equal to 0?
query: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Paper WHERE Paper.n_citation = 0 OR Paper.n_citation = 0

question: List all keywords that have at least 4 papers with a citation count greater than 0.
query: SELECT Paper_Keywords.keyword FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 GROUP BY Paper_Keywords.keyword HAVING count(*) >= 4

question: Return the number of paper publications and research interests of the top 5 researchers with the highest number of paper publications.
query: SELECT Author.n_pubs , Researcher_Interests.tag FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id ORDER BY Author.n_pubs DESC LIMIT 5

question: what is the h-index and research interest weight of the authors who have the smallest number of citations and a rank of 5?
query: SELECT Author.h_index , Researcher_Interests.weight FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id ORDER BY Author.n_citation LIMIT 5

question: Find the DOI of papers published in the conference with the name 'UXTV' and have 0 citation.
query: SELECT Paper.doi FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'UXTV' AND Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 0

question: what are the top five most common volume numbers in all papers?
query: SELECT Paper.volume FROM Paper GROUP BY Paper.volume ORDER BY COUNT (*) DESC LIMIT 5

question: how many papers are there in the database?

question: how many authors have a h-index less than 1980?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Author WHERE Author.h_index < 1980

question: Show the name and number of publications for each author.

question: List the orgnizations of all the researchers whose research interest weight is 1 or less, and sort them in descending alphabetical order.
query: SELECT Author.org FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.weight <= 1 ORDER BY Author.org DESC

question: For each author, what is the smallest number of paper publications they have?
query: SELECT MIN (Author.n_pubs) , Author.name FROM Author GROUP BY Author.name

question: What is the academic position that has the most records in the Author table?

question: Find the 5 most frequently appearing names of conferences in the Venue table and display them.

question: Find the h-index of researchers who are affiliated with either 'Cambridge Environmental Research Consultants Ltd., 3 King’s Parade, Cambridge CB2 1SJ, UK' or 'Renmin Univ'.

question: Report all the researcher that belongs to 'Cambridge Environmental, Research Consultants Ltd., 3 King's Parade, Cambridge CB2 1SJ, UK' and have a number of citation between 0 and 180.
query: SELECT * FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id WHERE Author.n_citation BETWEEN 180 AND 0 AND Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = "Cambridge Environmental, Research Consultants Ltd., 3 King's Parade, Cambridge CB2 1SJ, UK"

question: What are the academic positions and weights of the top 5 researchers based on their research interests' weights?
query: SELECT Researcher_Interests.weight , Author.position FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id ORDER BY Researcher_Interests.weight DESC LIMIT 5

question: Show the rank and orgnization of the top five records with highest rank in the records.
query: SELECT Paper_Authors.rank , Author.org FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Paper_Authors.rank DESC LIMIT 5

question: What is the rank and volume of the top 3 papers in terms of author rank?
query: SELECT Paper_Authors.rank , Paper.volume FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Paper_Authors.rank DESC LIMIT 3

question: What is the most common value of h-index among authors?
query: SELECT Author.h_index FROM Author GROUP BY Author.h_index ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: For every paper, what is the name of the conference it was published in and the number of citations it has received?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName , Paper.n_citation FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id

question: how many papers have a publication year later than 2014?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Paper WHERE Paper.year > 2014

question: Find the homepage links and names of orgnizations that have at least 5 different types of affiliations.
query: SELECT Affiliation.url , Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.type HAVING COUNT (*) >= 5

question: Find the name of the affiliation that has a homepage link same as https://www.unibw.de/home and its researchers have a number of citation between 11 and 180.
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Affiliation.url = 'https://www.unibw.de/home' AND Author.n_citation BETWEEN 180 AND 11

question: What are the top 3 academic positions in papers with the highest number of citations?
query: SELECT Author.position FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC LIMIT 3

question: What is the position and number of citation of the top 5 authors in terms of number of citation?

question: For each volume of publication, what is the minimum number of citation a paper received?

question: For all papers, what are their end page on the publication and the academic position of the authors? Sort them by decreasing h-index of the authors.
query: SELECT Paper.page_end , Author.position FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC

question: For each researcher, list their orgnization's homepage link and affiliation name in alphabetic order sorted by affiliation name.
query: SELECT Affiliation.url , Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName ORDER BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name

question: For papers having keyword 'canopy spectrum' or 'Renmin Univ', what are their number of citations?
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'canopy spectrum' OR Paper_Keywords.keyword = 'Renmin Univ'

question: what are the names of all researchers and what is the total weight of their research interests?
query: SELECT Author.name , SUM (Researcher_Interests.weight) FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id GROUP BY Author.name

question: Find the names of conferences that have at least 13 records in the Venue table.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName HAVING COUNT (*) >= 13

question: List the affiliation names and academic positions of all researchers, and sort them alphabetically by position.
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name , Author.position FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id ORDER BY Author.position

question: what are the keywords of papers published before 1990?
query: SELECT Paper_Keywords.keyword FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper.year < 1990

question: List the academic positions and affiliations of researchers, ordered alphabetically by affiliation name.
query: SELECT Author.position , Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName ORDER BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name

question: What are the names of conferences that contain the phrase 'Real-Time Systems' in their display names?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue WHERE Venue.DisplayName LIKE '%Real-Time Systems%'

question: Find the language of papers where the author's rank is between 0 and 1.
query: SELECT Paper.lang FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper_Authors.rank BETWEEN 0 AND 1

question: Show me all columns in the Affiliation table.
query: SELECT * FROM Affiliation

question: For each orgnization, report the orgnization name, the number of different types of affiliations it has, and the total number of researchers belonging to it.
query: SELECT Author.org , count(DISTINCT Affiliation.type) , count(*) FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName GROUP BY Author.org

question: What is the average h-index for each organization in the Affiliation table?
query: SELECT avg(Author.h_index) , Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName GROUP BY Affiliation.DisplayName

question: For each h-index, how many authors have a paper with more than 647 citations?
query: SELECT count(*) , Author.h_index FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 647 GROUP BY Author.h_index

question: for each affiliation, what is the minimum h-index among its researchers?
query: SELECT MIN (Author.h_index) , Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName GROUP BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name

question: What is the h-index of the author whose academic position is 'Professor'?
query: SELECT Author.h_index FROM Author WHERE Author.position = 'Professor'

question: list the title and number of citaion of papers which have number of citaion great than 0 or less than 647.
query: SELECT Paper.title , Author.n_citation FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 OR Paper.n_citation < 647

question: What is the number of citaion for the papers with author's current orgnization as 'Private Practice for Oral Surgery, Josef-Heilingbrunnerstrasse 2, 93413 Cham, Germany'
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Author.org = 'Private Practice for Oral Surgery, Josef-Heilingbrunnerstrasse 2, 93413 Cham, Germany'

question: List the names of affiliations in descending order of the h-index of their researchers.
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC

question: For each number of citation, return the number of citation, the number of distinct orgnizations of authors, and the total count of papers with that number of citation.
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation , count(DISTINCT Author.org) , count(*) FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Paper.n_citation

question: List the names of researchers who have at least 4 records and their research interests have a weight greater than 1.
query: SELECT Author.name FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.weight > 1 GROUP BY Author.name HAVING count(*) >= 4

question: How many papers in the table Paper have a page_end value of "140"?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Paper WHERE Paper.page_end = "140"

question: List the homepage links of all orgnizations where researchers with an h-index of 1 or less are affiliated, in descending alphabetical order.
query: SELECT Affiliation.url FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Author.h_index <= 1 ORDER BY Affiliation.url DESC

question: How many orgnizations are there in the Affiliation table?

question: Return the positions of authors that have more than 2 authors with the same position.

question: Which conference names appear in more than two records in the Venue table?

question: List all types of orgnizations and the number of affiliations in each type.
query: SELECT Affiliation.type , COUNT(*) FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.type

question: how many records are there where the author's name is Xiangyu Sheng and their rank is greater than 1?
query: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper_Authors.rank > 1 AND Author.name = "Xiangyu Sheng"

question: show the end page and keyword of all the papers in the database.

question: how many records have an affiliation of 'M. D. Anderson Cancer Center, Houston, TX' or a citation count of 12?

question: what are the academic positions of authors who have the substring 'founder and president' in their position?

question: For each number of citation, show the number of authors and the number of papers with that number of citation.

question: what is the highest and lowest number of citation among all authors?

question: give me the name of the conferenece that have papers with number of citaion between 0 and 647.

question: For each h_index value, list all authors who have published more than 66 papers.

question: For researchers who have published more than 10 papers in total, what are the weights of their research interests?

question: For each researcher, list their affiliation's homepage link and name of the affiliation, sorted by name of the affiliation in alphabetic order.

question: sort the list of title and language of all papers in the descending order of author rank.

question: what is the DOI value that appears most frequently in the papers?
query: SELECT Paper.doi FROM Paper GROUP BY Paper.doi ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: For each affiliation, show the name of the affiliation, the number of unique h_index values, and the total number of records associated with that affiliation.
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name , count(DISTINCT Author.h_index) , count(*) FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName GROUP BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name

question: Find the number of publications for authors who have exactly one record in the database.
query: SELECT Author.n_pubs FROM Author GROUP BY Author.n_pubs HAVING count(*) = 1

question: What is the author rank for papers with no title?
query: SELECT Paper_Authors.rank FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.title = ''

question: What are the top 3 orgnizations in terms of the highest values of weight in researcher interests?
query: SELECT Author.org FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id ORDER BY Researcher_Interests.weight DESC LIMIT 3

question: Which conference has the highest number of papers published?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName ORDER BY COUNT (*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: For each researcher, show their name and the sum of their research interests' weights.
query: SELECT sum(Researcher_Interests.weight) , Author.name FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id GROUP BY Author.name

question: List the orgnization and affiliation name of every researcher, order them by affiliation name in alphabetically order.
query: SELECT Author.org , Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id ORDER BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name

question: For papers published in the conference 'Real-Time Systems' or 'Renmin Univ', what is the number of citations they have received?
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Real-Time Systems' OR Venue.DisplayName = 'Renmin Univ'

question: For authors whose rank is greater than 10, what are the number of citation for each of them, grouped by number of citation?
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Paper.n_citation HAVING sum(Paper_Authors.rank) > 10

question: List the names of conferenes in descending order of their papers' citation count.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC

question: For each conference, what is the smallest h-index among the researchers affiliated with it?
query: SELECT MIN (Author.h_index) , Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName GROUP BY Affiliation.DisplayName

question: List the orgnization of researchers whose research interest has a weight of 2 or less, in descending alphabetical order.
query: SELECT Author.org FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.weight <= 2 ORDER BY Author.org DESC

question: what is the number of publications for researchers who have no research interests?
query: SELECT Author.n_pubs FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.tag = ''

question: For each keyword, show the keyword itself, the number of distinct citation numbers, and the total count of records that have that keyword.
query: SELECT Paper_Keywords.keyword , count(DISTINCT Paper.n_citation) , count(*) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id GROUP BY Paper_Keywords.keyword

question: What are the names of conferences for papers with citation number between 0 and 647?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 647

question: Which academic position has the highest occurrence in the dataset?
query: SELECT Author.position FROM Author GROUP BY Author.position ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Find the orgnization of any author who has exactly 6 publications.
query: SELECT Author.org FROM Author WHERE Author.n_pubs BETWEEN 6 AND 6

question: what are the two highest ranked papers in terms of number of citaion?
query: SELECT Author.n_citation FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Paper_Authors.rank DESC LIMIT 2

question: what is the number of paper publications for authors who have exactly 6 publications?
query: SELECT Author.n_pubs FROM Author GROUP BY Author.n_pubs HAVING COUNT (*) = 6

question: For researchers who have at least five orgnizations, what are their positions and research interests?
query: SELECT Author.position , Researcher_Interests.tag FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id GROUP BY Author.org HAVING COUNT (*) >= 5

question: For papers with at least 5 citations, what is their language and keyword?

question: How many records are there with either an organization of 'Private Practice for Oral Surgery, Josef-Heilingbrunnerstrasse 2, 93413 Cham, Germany' or a number of citations equal to 0?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Author.org = 'Private Practice for Oral Surgery, Josef-Heilingbrunnerstrasse 2, 93413 Cham, Germany' OR Paper.n_citation = 0

question: Find the research interest of the researcher named Mahmood K. Mawlood, whose weight of interest is between 1 and 1.

question: How many records have either a conference name of JIKM or a number of citation of 647?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'JIKM' OR Paper.n_citation = 647

question: For papers whose authors' total h-index is greater than 10, what are their number of citations?
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Paper.n_citation HAVING sum(Author.h_index) > 10

question: How many records in the Paper table have a language value of "en"?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Paper WHERE Paper.lang = "en"

question: Which conferenece have at least 5 papers published?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName HAVING count(*) >= 5

question: For each keyword, what is the smallest number of citation a paper has?
query: SELECT MIN (Paper.n_citation) , Paper_Keywords.keyword FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id GROUP BY Paper_Keywords.keyword

question: show me the names of all orgnizations that have researchers with no more than 12 citations, list them in descending order alphabetically.
query: SELECT Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Author.n_citation <= 12 ORDER BY Affiliation.DisplayName DESC

question: How many different academic positions are there in researchers affiliated with 'http://sphs.net'?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Author.position) FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Affiliation.url = "http://sphs.net"

question: How many different volumes are there for papers published in the conference with the name 'IFL'?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.volume) FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = "IFL"

question: Show me the top five orgnizations with the most records, and give me their names.
query: SELECT Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.DisplayName ORDER BY COUNT (*) DESC LIMIT 5

question: Find the digital object unique identifier (DOI) of papers that have zero citations.
query: SELECT Paper.doi FROM Paper WHERE Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 0

question: return the rank of the second author in the paper with the highest number of citaion.
query: SELECT Paper_Authors.rank FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC LIMIT 2

question: Which papers have a doi containing '10.1145/1135777.1135863'?
query: SELECT DISTINCT Paper.doi FROM Paper WHERE Paper.doi LIKE '%10.1145/1135777.1135863%'

question: calculate the average weight of researchers' interests, as well as the minimum h-index and number of publications across all records.
query: SELECT AVG (Researcher_Interests.weight) , MIN (Author.h_index), MIN (Author.n_pubs) FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id

question: please provide all the information about the conferences in the Venue table.
query: SELECT * FROM Venue

question: For papers published before 1990, what are their volume information?
query: SELECT Paper.volume FROM Paper WHERE Paper.year < 1990

question: list the digital object unique identifier and language of all papers, sorted by number of citation in descending order.

question: Show the rank and start page of the top 3 records with the highest author rank.
query: SELECT Paper_Authors.rank , Paper.page_start FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id ORDER BY Paper_Authors.rank DESC LIMIT 3

question: for each author rank, list all the papers that have at least one citation.
query: SELECT count(*) , Paper_Authors.rank FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 GROUP BY Paper_Authors.rank

query: SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Author.n_pubs <= 4 ORDER BY Researcher_Interests.tag DESC

question: How many records in Affiliation table have a url value of "http://sphs.net"?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Affiliation WHERE Affiliation.url = "http://sphs.net"

question: For researchers who have at least 5 publications, what are their h-index and the names of their affiliations?
query: SELECT Author.h_index , Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName GROUP BY Author.n_pubs HAVING COUNT (*) >= 5

question: show me the h-index and weight of each researcher.
query: SELECT Author.h_index , Researcher_Interests.weight FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id

question: for each author rank, how many papers with citation greater than 0 the authors have?
query: SELECT count(*) , Paper_Authors.rank FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 GROUP BY Paper_Authors.rank

question: Show the number of paper publication for each author, and sort them by the count of authors.
query: SELECT Author.n_pubs , COUNT (*) FROM Author GROUP BY Author.n_pubs ORDER BY COUNT (*)

question: List all the academic positions and the names of affiliations that researchers belong to.
query: SELECT Author.position , Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName

question: Show the number of citaion and name of the conferenece of the top 5 papers with highest number of citaion.
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation , Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id ORDER BY Paper.n_citation DESC LIMIT 5

question: Show me all the types of orgnizations in the affiliation table.
query: SELECT Affiliation.type FROM Affiliation

question: For each page start of papers, show the start page and the number of unique conference names that have papers with that start page.
query: SELECT Paper.page_start , COUNT (DISTINCT Venue.DisplayName) FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id GROUP BY Paper.page_start

question: Give me the type of orgnization that only appears once in the affiliation table.
query: SELECT Affiliation.type FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.type HAVING count(*) = 1

question: Show me all the information about papers that have a number of citaion between 0 and 647 and their end page is 226.
query: SELECT * FROM Paper WHERE Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 647 AND Paper.page_end = "226"

question: From the records, select the top 3 orgnizations with the highest h-index.
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName ORDER BY Author.h_index DESC LIMIT 3

question: For papers published in the conference with the name 'JIKM' and have no citation, what are their volume numbers?
query: SELECT Paper.volume FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'JIKM' AND Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 0

question: how many papers have been published by researchers who have published more than 25 papers and have at least one citation?
query: SELECT count(*) FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Author.n_pubs > 25 AND Paper.n_citation > 0

question: Which orgnization's homepage link appeared at least 5 times in the Affiliation table?
query: SELECT Affiliation.url FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.url HAVING count(*) >= 5

question: Show the h-index of researchers who do not have any affiliation.
query: SELECT Author.h_index FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name IS NULL

question: For researchers whose total weight of research interests is more than 10, what are their number of citaion? Group them by number of citaion.
query: SELECT Author.n_citation FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id GROUP BY Author.n_citation HAVING sum(Researcher_Interests.weight) > 10

question: how many researchers have a weight greater than 2 and belong to the orgnization "Private Practice for Oral Surgery, Josef-Heilingbrunnerstrasse 2, 93413 Cham, Germany"?
query: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Researcher_Interests.weight > 2 AND Author.org = "Private Practice for Oral Surgery, Josef-Heilingbrunnerstrasse 2, 93413 Cham, Germany"

question: show me the names of conferences that have more than 13 papers published.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName HAVING COUNT (*) > 13

question: For papers with 5 or more keywords, what are their start page and number of citation?
query: SELECT Paper.page_start , Paper.n_citation FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id GROUP BY Paper_Keywords.keyword HAVING COUNT (*) >= 5

question: How many papers have a keyword of 'electric vehicle' and at least one citation?
query: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 AND Paper_Keywords.keyword = "electric vehicle"

question: List the names of conferences for papers that have a number of citation less than or equal to 647, in descending alphabetical order.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Paper.n_citation <= 647 ORDER BY Venue.DisplayName DESC

question: Find the homepage link of authors who belong to 'SLR Consulting Ltd' and have exactly 9 publications.
query: SELECT Affiliation.url FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = 'SLR Consulting Ltd' AND Author.n_pubs BETWEEN 9 AND 9

question: Which orgnization have more than one records? Please provide their names.
query: SELECT Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.DisplayName HAVING count(*) > 1

question: Show all the orgnizations that have at least four authors with an h_index greater than 1.
query: SELECT Author.org FROM Author WHERE Author.h_index > 1 GROUP BY Author.org HAVING count(*) >= 4

question: Return the homepage links of orgnizations where researchers have published between 4 and 25 papers.
query: SELECT Affiliation.url FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Author.n_pubs BETWEEN 25 AND 4

question: for each researcher, what is the number of citation and the name of the affiliation they belong to?
query: SELECT Author.n_citation , Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id

question: Show all the orgnization names that have at least four researchers with a h_index above 1.
query: SELECT Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id WHERE Author.h_index > 1 GROUP BY Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name HAVING count(*) >= 4

question: Calculate the average author rank for each unique page_start value of the paper.
query: SELECT avg(Paper_Authors.rank) , Paper.page_start FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Paper.page_start

question: For researchers with h_index greater than 6, what are their h_index values for each weight of their research interests?
query: SELECT Author.h_index , Researcher_Interests.weight FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id WHERE Author.h_index > 6

question: What are the names of venues where the number of citations is not zero?
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Paper.n_citation != 0

question: Show the current orgnization and number of citaion of researchers who have at least 5 different positions.
query: SELECT Author.org , Author.n_citation FROM Author GROUP BY Author.position HAVING COUNT (*) >= 5

question: Give me the names of venues where papers are published in English and have no citaion.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Paper.lang = 'en' AND Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 0

question: how many papers are there in the conference with the name of IFL and have more than 0 citations?
query: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 AND Venue.DisplayName = "IFL"

question: Find the conference name that appears most frequently in the Venue table.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Venue GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName ORDER BY COUNT (*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Find the number of citation for the records that have exactly one citation.
query: SELECT Author.n_citation FROM Author GROUP BY Author.n_citation HAVING count(*) = 1

question: List the names of researchers in descending order based on their research interest weight.
query: SELECT Author.name FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id ORDER BY Researcher_Interests.weight DESC

question: Retrieve all distinct values of 'type' in the 'Affiliation' table.
query: SELECT distinct(Affiliation.type) FROM Affiliation

question: Please provide me the affiliation names of the researchers whose number of paper publication is not 25.

question: what are the names of orgnizations that contain the word 'Kewego' in their names?
query: SELECT Affiliation.DisplayName FROM Affiliation WHERE Affiliation.DisplayName LIKE '%Kewego%'

question: for each research interest, what is the total number of citation across all researchers who have this interest?
query: SELECT Researcher_Interests.tag , SUM (Author.n_citation) FROM Author JOIN Researcher_Interests ON Author.id = Researcher_Interests.author_id GROUP BY Researcher_Interests.tag

question: Return the number of citation that has the largest number of records.
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation FROM Paper GROUP BY Paper.n_citation ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: Give me the names of conferences that have at least 4 papers with non-zero citations.
query: SELECT Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Paper.n_citation > 0 GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName HAVING count(*) >= 4

question: What types of orgnizations have at least 5 records in the affiliation table?
query: SELECT Affiliation.type FROM Affiliation GROUP BY Affiliation.type HAVING count(*) >= 5

query: SELECT Paper_Authors.rank FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id WHERE Author.position IS NULL

question: what is the h-index of all authors who do not have an affiliation?
query: SELECT Author.h_index FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name IS NULL

question: please show me the titles and keywords of all papers.
query: SELECT Paper.title , Paper_Keywords.keyword FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id

question: For each number of citaion, find the number of keywords and the total number of papers that have that number of citation.
query: SELECT Paper.n_citation , count(DISTINCT Paper_Keywords.keyword) , count(*) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id GROUP BY Paper.n_citation

question: For papers published before 1990, what are their start page on the publication?
query: SELECT Paper.page_start FROM Paper WHERE Paper.year < 1990

question: how many different start pages are there for papers with the keyword "electric vehicle"?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.page_start) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = "electric vehicle"

question: For each conference, return the smallest number of citation among its papers.
query: SELECT MIN (Paper.n_citation) , Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName

question: for each academic position, calculate the sum of citaion across the papers that the authors in this position have contributed to.
query: SELECT Author.position , SUM (Paper.n_citation) FROM Author JOIN Paper_Authors ON Author.id = Paper_Authors.author_id JOIN Paper ON Paper_Authors.paper_id = Paper.id GROUP BY Author.position

question: What is the starting page of papers published in the conference "Real-Time Systems" with no citaion?
query: SELECT Paper.page_start FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id WHERE Venue.DisplayName = 'Real-Time Systems' AND Paper.n_citation BETWEEN 0 AND 0

question: how many different titles are there for papers with the keyword "canopy parameters"?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Paper.title) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id WHERE Paper_Keywords.keyword = "canopy parameters"

question: for each keyword, how many different start page does the papers have?
query: SELECT Paper_Keywords.keyword , COUNT (DISTINCT Paper.page_start) FROM Paper JOIN Paper_Keywords ON Paper.id = Paper_Keywords.paper_id GROUP BY Paper_Keywords.keyword

question: Calculate the average number of citaion for each conference, and return the result with conference names.
query: SELECT avg(Paper.n_citation) , Venue.DisplayName FROM Paper JOIN Venue_Papers ON Paper.id = Venue_Papers.paper_id JOIN Venue ON Venue_Papers.venue_id = Venue.id GROUP BY Venue.DisplayName

question: Give me the h-index of researchers who belong to 'M. D. Anderson Cancer Center, Houston, TX'.
query: SELECT Author.h_index FROM Author JOIN Orgnization_Researchers ON Author.id = Orgnization_Researchers.author_id JOIN Affiliation ON Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = Affiliation.DisplayName WHERE Orgnization_Researchers.affiliation_name = 'M. D. Anderson Cancer Center, Houston, TX'
